title: Which Fantasy Receivers Do You Want in 2019? l The Dantasy Football Podcast
description:
Danny Kelly, Danny Heifetz, and Craig Horlbeck debate whether PPR is for cowards (spoiler: yes) and then discuss who could be a league winner in 2019, whose bandwagon is too full, and a conspiracy theory on Antonio Brown and his freezer-burned feet.



      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
